main event: Mr. James H. Nichols observed a bright light moving in the sky while driving on Highway 53 northwest of Duluth, Minnesota, on April 9, 1963.
interesting points: The object was oval in shape and traveling at a high rate of speed,The object made a sudden 90-degree turn to the west and accelerated away,Mr. Nichols reported the sighting to the Duluth Air Force Base,The weather at the time of the observation was clear with excellent visibility,The object was at an estimated altitude of about 2,000 feet.
sighted object: bright light moving in the sky
witness description: Mr. James H. Nichols, a reputable businessman
